statements: SELECT * FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, editor_name FROM literary_journals WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT journal_name, editor_name FROM literary_journals WHERE editor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT journal_name, submission_guidelines FROM literary_journals ORDER BY journal_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals ORDER BY publication_date DESC, journal_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT journal_name, submission_guidelines FROM literary_journals WHERE editor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT journal_id, journal_name, editor_name FROM literary_journals WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' AND editor_name IS NULL
SELECT * FROM literary_journals WHERE publication_date >= '2019-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2020-01-01'
SELECT count(*) AS total_rows FROM literary_journals
SELECT * FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, publisher_name FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, publication_title, publication_date FROM literary_journals JOIN publications ON literary_journals.journal_id = publications.journal_id;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title FROM publications WHERE journal_id = 1 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT journal_name, publisher_name FROM literary_journals WHERE journal_id > 5;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT journal_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS number_of_publications FROM literary_journals LEFT JOIN publications ON literary_journals.journal_id = publications.journal_id GROUP BY journal_name;
SELECT publication_title, journal_name FROM publications JOIN literary_journals ON publications.journal_id = literary_journals.journal_id ORDER BY publication_date DESC, publication_title ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT publisher_name FROM literary_journals WHERE journal_name LIKE '%Review%';
SELECT * FROM journals;
SELECT journal_name, editor_name FROM journals ORDER BY editor_name DESC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT journal_name, editor_name, publication_count FROM journals WHERE publication_count > 10 ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
SELECT journal_name, editor_name FROM journals;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT journal_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS total_publications FROM journals JOIN publications ON journals.journal_id = publications.journal_id GROUP BY journal_name;
SELECT * FROM journals WHERE publication_count > 10 ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, frequency FROM literary_journals ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, frequency FROM literary_journals ORDER BY journal_id DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, article_title FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals;
SELECT journal_name, publication_frequency FROM literary_journals ORDER BY publication_frequency ASC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT journal_name, publication_title, author_name FROM literary_journals JOIN publications ON literary_journals.journal_id = publications.journal_id JOIN authors ON publications.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT * FROM literary_journals WHERE publisher_id = 1;
SELECT journal_name, publication_frequency FROM literary_journals WHERE publication_frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT article_title, author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author_id = authors.author_id ORDER BY article_title DESC;
